rows.label: tlk45300021_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Lately there are these thieves at large
who go after Core Crystals.

rows.label: tlk45300021_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Some rumors say it's Iira, but
others say they're unconnected.

rows.label: tlk45300021_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Whoever the crooks are, they
attacked the Military Engineer Corps
my brother works for.

rows.label: tlk45300021_03_msg0004
rows.name:
He was pretty badly injured, but
apparently he's going to be all right...
